1. Aries - 8/10 - Natural risk-takers, Aries thrive in high-pressure environments.
2. Taurus - 5/10 - Pragmatic and cautious, Tauruses often struggle with uncertainty.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, Geminis excel at navigating complex situations.
4. Cancer - 6/10 - Emotionally driven, Cancers can be impulsive but also risk-averse.
5. Leo - 7/10 - Confident and charismatic, Leos often take calculated risks to achieve their goals.
6. Virgo - 3/10 - Analytical and detail-oriented, Virgos tend to avoid taking unnecessary risks.
7. Libra - 4/10 - Diplomatic and social, Librans can be hesitant to take risks due to fear of conflict.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Passionate and intense, Scorpios are natural thrill-seekers who often push boundaries.
9. Sagittarius - 8/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, Sagittarians thrive in environments that allow for exploration and growth.
10. Capricorn - 4/10 - Disciplined and cautious, Capricorns tend to prefer planning over spontaneity.
11. Aquarius - 7/10 - Humanitarian and independent, Aquarians often take risks to challenge the status quo.
12. Pisces - 2/10 - Empathetic and imaginative, Pisces can be reckless but also hesitant due to fear of vulnerability.
